pullRequest.body:
Adaptation PR for leanprover/lean4#3258, which fixes leanprover/lean4#3229.

LGTM!  I hesitate to maintainer merge this, since I do not fully understand the implications, but it looks just like the fixes after https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/pull/3258.
